verses.name: Mark 1:23
verses.text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit; and he cried out,

verses.name: Mark 1:24
verses.text: Saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art, the Holy One of God.

verses.name: Mark 1:25
verses.text: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him.

verses.name: Mark 1:26
verses.text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him, and cried with a loud voice, he came out of him.
